scar

Class RS

  • java.lang.Object
    • scar.RS

  • public class RS
extends java.lang.Object
    RS handles the RS algorithm for encoding our data into chunks and decoding chunks back into a single data stream

      • encode

        public byte[][] encode(byte[] data,
                       int k,
                       int n)
        Perfoms the encoding process of RS EncodedChunks = EncodeMatrix * DataMatrix
        Parameters:
        data - input data byte array
        k - k
        n - n
        Returns:
        our n x chunk_len encoded chunks

      • decode

        public byte[] decode(Chunk[] chunks,
                     int k,
                     int n)
        Algorithm:
        1. Take K chunks in order of their index
        2. Make Encoding matrix [encode]
        3. Select the rows in Encoding that correspond to our K chunks
        4. Make K chunks into Matrix [data]
        5. reverse encode and data
        6. multiply encode and data
        7. convert result to byte array
        Parameters:
        chunks - input chunk array
        k - k
        n - n
        Returns:
        original byte array fed into encode.
